value:
Hello there, and welcome to
Abyssal Fall.
I'm going to teach you the game's basics so you can understand why you lost to your friends. :)
In this game the only rule you have to remember is:

The main thing is that:
any tile you touch will fall.
Go ahead try to move to the next checkpoint with the <color=teal>left stick</color>
Hum sorry, I had my ""Free to play"" mode active...
Anyway, here you can <color=green>cross small gaps</color> just by <color=green>walking across them</color>.

It's not a bug, It's a feature!
Try it, just move right and you go right across.
Nice, let's try something slightly more tough.
In the arena, enemies will try to attack you (obviously)

You can use a dash to dodge attacks,
jump across gaps,
and even counter some projectiles if timed correctly.

Just tap the A button to do a short dash.
Hold it to do do a long dash.
You can also use a dash to <color=green>push back</color> your enemies
Try it on this <color=teal>magic</color> wall, it should open up to let you pass.
That will be cheap to replace right ?

Well, since you are here,
don't press the Y button to use you special attack.
I'll go get a quotation for that wall, I'll be right back.

Yeah, I figured you'd do that...
Joke's on you, I've got a quotation for both these walls !
afterlife walls are so freaking expensive...

You know what?!
Last lesson: How about you jump down?!
You'll get back to the <color=teal>main menu</color> and I won't have to sell my balls to pay for more of your damage!
